content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the riverbed cardigan junior sizes 2t to 12y fit oversized cardigan with 4 of positive ease skill level confident beginner yarn colour theory by lion brand yarn worsted weight #4 construction this pattern is worked flat making panels so there are no increases and decreases sizes were calculated using standard american sizes the pattern does include a link to the full video tutorial on youtube the pattern uses standard american terms you can also find the adult version of this pattern here on my etsy shop i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use the hashtag #riverbedcardigan ** please note that you can find this pattern for free with ads on my blog at cjdesignblog com **
